channel.title: adb on 不折腾不舒服
channel.description: Recent content in adb on 不折腾不舒服

item.title: adb连接到rk30sdk
item.description: 修改 ~/.android/adb_usb.ini 文件 添加 0x2207 注意文件中不能有空行, 否则可能报错: * daemon not running. starting it now on port 5037 * ADB server didn't ACK * failed to start daemon * 文件修改好后重启一下服务 tianMac:platform-tools tian$ ./adb kill-server tianMac:platform-tools tian$ ./adb start-server * daemon not running. starting it now on port 5037 * * daemon started successfully * 然后应该就可以看见设备了.
